data.question: What is the empirical formula of Ni-TCPE1?
What is the yield percentage of Ni-TCPE1 when synthesized?
At what temperature and pressure was the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides conducted using Ni-TCPE1?
Is the CO2 adsorption capacity of Ni-TCPE1 higher at 273 K or 298 K?
True or False: Ni-TCPE2 has a higher yield than Ni-TCPE1 in the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides under identical conditions.
What is the role of TBABr in the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides?
True or False: The CO2 uptake capacity of Ni-TCPE1 decreases with an increase in temperature from 273 K to 298 K.
What is the total turnover number (TON) value achieved by Ni-TCPE1 after 20 times of repeating the catalytic reaction?
True or False: The synthesis of Ni-TCPE2 requires a higher amount of L-Pro compared to Ni-TCPE1.
What is the initial turnover frequency (TOF) of Ni-TCPE1 in the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides?
data.answer: 1000 per mole of catalyst per hour

data.question: True or False: The catalytic activity of Ni-TCPE1 is significantly reduced after 70 hours of reaction time.
What is the effect of increasing the reaction temperature on the yield of the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides using Ni-TCPE1?
data.answer: Increasing the temperature increases the yield

data.question: True or False: Ni-TCPE1 and Ni-TCPE2 have the same crystal system.
What is the void volume of Ni-TCPE1 per unit cell?
True or False: The CO2 uptake capacity of Ni-TCPE2 is higher at 273 K compared to 298 K.
What is the role of L-Pro in the synthesis of Ni-TCPE1?
True or False: The synthesis of Ni-TCPE1 and Ni-TCPE2 both require the use of DMF as a solvent.
What is the recyclability feature of Ni-TCPE1 in the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 to epoxides?
data.answer: It can be reused with minimal loss in activity

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of Ni-TCPE2 yields a higher percentage compared to Ni-TCPE1.
What is the effect of increasing the amount of L-Pro in the synthesis of Ni-TCPE compounds?
data.answer: It leads to the formation of Ni-TCPE2 with a different structure
